form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/26/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB NO. 43-RO 401 PETITION TO Fee Stamp CLASSIFY STATUS OF PLEASE NOTE $ 10-00 fee in local currency collected YOU ARE THE PETITIONER ALIEN RELATIVE FOR AND YOUR RELATIVE ISSUANCE OF CARDIO IS THE IMMIGRANT VISA BENEFICIARY DEPARTMENT UNITED STOREY 1. Name of beneficiary (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. Do Not Write VT This Space 3. Names. birthdates and countries of birth of JUDGE JAGDEV SINGH beneficiary's children: NEW 4. Other names used: (including maiden name if married) DELHI JUDGE JATESHWAR SINGH BORN JAGDEV SINGH ON AUG 27th 1944 INDIA 5. Country of beneficiary's birth 6. Date of beneficiary's birth (Month, day. year) 2. JUDGE JAGESHWAR SINGH BORN LAHORE, PAKISTAN APRIL 18th, 1912 ON AUG. 7th, 194 IN INDIA 7. My name is: (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 8. My phone number is: JUDGE HARCHARAN SINGH 3. MRS. LILY SINGH BORN ON Mayand, (714)359-1649 1942 IN LAHORE PAKISTAN 9. Other names used: (including maiden name if married woman) 10. Relationship of beneficiary to myself HARCHARAN SINGH BROTHER 11 I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) in: (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) FEB. 20th, 1910 VILLAGE GOJRA, PUNJAB STATE, PAKISTAN, THEN INDIA 12. If you are a citizen of the United States. give the following: Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) through birth in the U.S. through parents through naturalization through marriage (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate. and date and place of naturalization HARCHARAN SINGH JUDGE, No: 11280388, APRIL 16 H2, 1981, AT Los ANGELES, (2) (If known) My former alien registration number was A 301 956 CALIF. (3) If acquired through parentage or marriage. have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name? (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: (b) if not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with instruction 3 a (2) 13. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: a. Alien Registration Number: 10 Date. place. and means of admission for lawful permanent residence A- 14. Beneficiary's marital status: 15. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married. and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is Married Widowed Divorced Single for your spouse) MRS. CHARANJIT KAUR, Nov. 23, 1923, INDIA 16. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) ABOVE ARORBANS PRESS KATRA SHER SINGH, AMRITSAR, PUNJAB, INDIA EXCEPT MRS. LiLy SINGH AT 6, KESTON ROAD, THORTON HEATH, SURREY, ENGLAND,U.K 17. if this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Names of my prior spouses C. Names of spouse's prior spouses 18. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? YES NO 19. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? YES NO (CONTINUE WITH ITEM 20 ON REVERSE) OATH OR A. FIRMATION OF PETITIONER : swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct Signature of petitioner (See Instruction No. 5) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before JUL this 0 1981 day of KO 19 at DELHI, INDIA. (SEAL) My commission expires (SIGNATURE OF OFFICER ADMINISTERING OATH) (TITLE) SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN PETITIONER I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the petitioner and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. (SIGNATURE) (ADDRESS) (DATE) RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D TRANS OUT COMPLETED FORM -130 (Rev 10.1-77) Y
